All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board  
    BoxSizeTest  
    CheckersBoard  
    CheckerWindow  
    ComputerPlayer
    The ComputerPlayer class represents a computer player and updates the board based on a model.
    Game
    The Game class represents a game of checkers and ensures that all moves made are valid as per the rules of checkers.
    HumanPlayer
    The HumanPlayer class represents a user of the checkers game that can update the game by clicking on tiles on the board.
    Logic
    The Logic class determines what a valid move is.
    Main  
    MainTest  
    Move
    The Move class represents a move and contains a weight associated with the move.
    MoveGenerate
    The MoveGenerate class provides a method for determining if a given checker can make any move or skip.
    OptionPanel  
    Player
    The Player class is an abstract class that represents a player in a game of checkers.
